name: Replication Extermination
description: Replication Extermination is a game in which the player, a Robot Replication Regulator, must hunt down and exterminate core after core of self-replicating robots. The robots were created to quickly mine the area, but have gone out of control and are replicating themselves endlessly! Using your pistol and your stealth, infiltrate the robot cores, destroy them and spend the credits you earn at Upgrade Workbenches to upgrade your stats! The world is procedurally generated and endless, so you can hunt the robot infestation for hours!
